Pre-Game Insights: Brandon Nimmo will look to build on his previous multi-hit performance (2-for-4 with two RBI) as the New York Mets face the Philadelphia Phillies in Game 2 of the NLDS.
The Mets own a 1-0 series lead going into Game 2.
Cristopher Sanchez will start as the pitcher for the Phillies, marking his 32nd start of the season with an 11-9 record and a 3.32 ERA.
